title: Off to the Races
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:00.53] My old man is a bad man, but
[00:03.20] I can't deny the way he holds my hand
[00:05.97] And he grabs me, he has me by my heart
[00:12.35] He doesn't mind I have a Las Vegas past
[00:15.22] He doesn't mind I have a L.A. crass way about me
[00:19.30] He loves me, with every beat of his cocaine heart
[00:23.95] Swimmin' pool glimmerin', darling
[00:26.21] White bikini off with my red nail polish
[00:29.27] Watch me in the swimmin' pool, bright blue ripples
[00:31.81] You sittin', sippin' on your Black Cristal, oh, yeah
[00:35.76] Light of my life, fire of my loins
[00:38.88] Be a good baby, do what I want
[00:41.89] Light of my life, fire of my loins
[00:44.97] Gimme them gold coins, gimme them coins
[00:47.40] And I'm off to the races, cases of Bacardi chasers
[00:51.03] Chasin' me all over town
[00:53.21] 'Cause he knows I'm wasted, facin' time again at Rikers Island
[00:57.31] And I won't get out
[00:59.28] Because I'm crazy, baby
[01:02.70] I need you to come here and save me
[01:05.25] I'm your little scarlet, starlet, singin' in the garden
[01:08.85] Kiss me on my open mouth
[01:11.05] Ready for you
[01:15.26] My old man is a tough man, but
[01:18.38] He got a soul as sweet as blood-red jam
[01:20.73] And he shows me, he knows me
[01:23.82] Every inch of my tar-black soul
[01:27.33] He doesn't mind I have a flat broke-down life
[01:30.18] In fact, he says he thinks it's what he might like about me
[01:34.33] Admires me, the way I roll like a rolling stone
[01:37.90] Likes to watch me in the glass room, bathroom, Ch√¢teau Marmont
[01:42.12] Slippin' on my red dress, puttin' on my makeup
[01:45.03] Glass room, perfume, cognac, lilac fumes
[01:48.58] Says it feels like heaven to him
[01:51.17] Light of his life, fire of his loins
[01:53.95] Keep me forever, tell me you own me
[01:57.09] Light of your life, fire of your loins
[01:59.93] Tell me you own me, gimme them coins
[02:02.47] And I'm off to the races, cases of Bacardi chasers
[02:06.06] Chasin' me all over town
[02:08.25] 'Cause he knows I'm wasted, facin' time again at Rikers Island
[02:12.33] And I won't get out
[02:14.15] Because I'm crazy, baby
[02:17.65] I need you to come here and save me
[02:20.11] I'm your little scarlet, starlet, singin' in the garden
[02:23.96] Kiss me on my open mouth
[02:26.17] Yo, I'm off to the races, laces
[02:28.42] Leather on my waist is tight, and I am fallin' down
[02:32.19] I can see your face, is shameless, Cipriani's Basement
[02:35.95] Love you, but I'm goin' down
[02:38.11] God, I'm so crazy, baby
[02:41.64] I'm sorry that I'm misbehaving
[02:44.21] I'm your little harlot, starlet, Queen of Coney Island
[02:48.07] Raisin' hell all over town
[02:50.19] Sorry 'bout it
[02:54.29] My old man is a thief, and
[02:56.99] I'm gonna stay and pray with him 'til the end
[03:02.42] But I trust in the decision of the Lord, to watch over us
[03:09.03] Take him when He may, if He may
[03:12.28] I'm not afraid to say that I'd die without him
[03:17.15] Who else is gonna put up with me this way?
[03:20.84] I need you, I breathe you, I'll never leave you!
[03:24.20] They would rue the day I was alone, without you
[03:29.69] You're lyin' with your gold chain on
[03:32.02] Cigar hangin' from your lips, I said, "Hon'"
[03:34.68] "You never looked so beautiful as you do now, my man"
[03:41.05] And we're off to the races, places
[03:43.52] Ready, set, the gate is down and now we're goin' in
[03:47.41] To Las Vegas, chaos, Casino Oasis
[03:50.92] Honey, it is time to spin
[03:53.39] Boy, you're so crazy, baby
[03:56.77] I love you forever, not maybe
[03:59.35] You are my one true love
[04:02.24] You are my one true love
[04:08.25] 
[04:23.41] You are my one true love
[04:26.06]
